sentence.Network_en: The Conservative government will not slacken the pace of radical reform.
sentence.Network_cn: 保守党政府不会放慢激进改革的步伐。

sentence.Network_en: Inflationary pressures continued to slacken last month.
sentence.Network_cn: 上个月，通货膨胀的压力继续减小。

sentence.Network_en: Muscles stretch, slacken and relax during child-birth.
sentence.Network_cn: 生孩子的时候，肌肉会拉抻、放松，然后松弛下来。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... ken 知识，眼界 slacken （使）松弛，放松 liken 把…比作，比拟.
航海及海运专业英语词汇(S6) ... slacken speed 减速 slacken 放慢 slacken 放松.
afraid that morale might slacken ., 害怕士气会松懈.
放字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 放手〖 letgo〗 放松〖 relax;slacken;loosen〗 放下〖 putdown;laydown〗.

list.abs: The runners slackened their pace ., 赛跑者放慢了步子.
slacken discipline ; afraid that morale might slacken ., 放松纪律 ; 害怕士气会松懈.

entry.def: If something slackens or if you slacken it, it becomes slower, less active, or less intense.

example.ex: Inflationary pressures continued to slacken last month...
example.tran: 上个月，通货膨胀的压力继续减小。

example.ex: The Conservative government will not slacken the pace of radical reform.
example.tran: 保守党政府不会放慢激进改革的步伐。

entry.def: If your grip or a part of your body slackens or if you slacken your grip, it becomes looser or more relaxed.

example.ex: Her grip slackened on Arnold's arm...
example.tran: 她紧握着阿诺德的手松开了。

example.ex: Muscles stretch, slacken and relax during childbirth.
example.tran: 生孩子的时候，肌肉会拉抻、放松，然后松弛下来。

sentences.sentence: "He slackened his pace as he got tired"

means.word_mean: 4. make slack as by lessening tension or firmness

auth_sentence.content: His slacken'd hand deserts the lance it bore.

auth_sentence.content: Using a potato masher or ricer, mash well, adding the olive oil to slacken and flavour the potatoes.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Using a potato masher or ricer, mash well, adding the olive oil to slacken and flavour the potatoes.

sentences.en: Slacken your legs and slowly lie back.
sentences.cn: 放松双腿, 慢慢向后躺下。

sentences.en: Simon allowed his pace to slacken.
We’ve been really busy, but things are starting to slacken off now.
sentences.cn: 我们忙极了，不过现在事情开始减少了。
